summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Gamma Poncin Addition and the alley in block 7, Stander Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No.108172 and 107867 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
